modName: Ebonmourne - The Most Overly Fancy Sword Ever
summary: Replaces the Ebony Blade with the ridiculously fancy evil spock version of my Eye of Meridia lightsword. More metal, more black, more wicked and a LOT MORE MOVING PARTS.  This weapon is held together by kickass and particle effects.  Really, some video is needed to really show off but I\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'m pretty pleased with how things look right now
descriptionHtml:
Replaces the Ebony Blade with the evil spock version of my Eye of Meridia lightsword. More metal, more black, more wicked and a LOT MORE MOVING PARTS.  This weapon is held together by kickass and particle effects.  Really, some video is needed to really show off but I\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\'m pretty pleased with how things look right now.  Acquire the Ebony blade as usual or cheat your way to it if you\\\'re not Finnish enough to get it the regular way and have fun!

If anyone wants to use this in a mod of their own you are  more than welcome to. I encourage it!
Behold sloth\'s little show off video! It\'s great!

[youtube]http://youtu.be/aD_E2scXh_Q[/youtube]

Dragonporn has some great screenshots! (website is in japanese)
http://dragonporn.ldblog.jp/archives/7310963.html#more
author: CuteUnit
